body_html:
OK, another thing to try: can you edit aten/src/ATen/cudnn/Descriptors.h and above struct AT_CUDA_API CTCLossDescriptor, add

#define XSTR(x) STR(x)
#define STR(x) #x
#pragma message "The value of CUDNN_VERSION: " XSTR(CUDNN_VERSION)
#error "aborting"

body:
OK, another thing to try: can you edit `aten/src/ATen/cudnn/Descriptors.h` and above `struct AT_CUDA_API CTCLossDescriptor`, add

```
#define XSTR(x) STR(x)
#define STR(x) #x
#pragma message "The value of CUDNN_VERSION: " XSTR(CUDNN_VERSION)
#error "aborting"
```
